topic.title: My ZeroNet shows that tor is always waiting~
topic.body:
I started Tor Browser with ShadowsocksR(127.0.0.1:1080) ;and add "Socks5Proxy 127.0.0.1:1080" in torrc file.
![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/14799855/17960226/562c23b2-6ad7-11e6-8b45-1ae320a68fc5.png)
But in ZeroNet , tor is always waiting . What should I do ?
In the log , there are words I think can help :
### TorManager Error starting Tor client: error: [Errno 10060] [Error 10060] 由于连接方在一段时间后没有正确答复或连接的主机没有反应，连接尝试失败。 in TorManager.py line 74 > TorManager.py line 101 > helper.py line 130 > socket.py line 86

1604065418_mirrored_q54528_github.body:
so I used valida and shadowsocksR , it works

2016-09-10 19:12 GMT+08:00 zeronet0 notifications@github.com:

> Because you are in China,The GFW has blocked tor's links.
> 
> —
> You are receiving this because you authored the thread.
> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
> https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet/issues/542#issuecomment-246106163,
> or mute the thread
> https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AOHT7xxd939OO0adlUdFSXuHbbBmmImEks5qopCLgaJpZM4JsxeL
> .

vidalia,sorry
